name.japanese: ウォーターセブン地下

description: A network of underground tunnels beneath Water 7 that contain the ruins of old buildings. These tunnels exist because Water 7 builds new structures over old ones after each Aqua Laguna flood.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Underground Tunnels
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Chopper, and Abi enter the underground tunnels after finding shreds of Aobire's scarf.
keyEvents.significance: Leads the group closer to discovering Aobire's fate.

keyEvents.title: Revelation of Water 7's Underground City
keyEvents.description: Abi explains that Water 7 builds new buildings over old ones due to recurring Aqua Laguna floods.
keyEvents.significance: Provides world-building information about Water 7's architecture.

statusHistory.reason: The underground tunnels exist as ruins beneath Water 7

description: A mystical underground location beneath Water 7 where Yagara Bulls go to die. It is a peaceful, otherworldly place with spiritual significance for the Yagara species.

keyEvents.title: Arrival at Tsui Village
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Chopper, and Abi arrive at Tsui Village, a mystical location where Yagara Bulls go to die.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the concept of Tsui Village as a sacred resting place for Yagara Bulls.

keyEvents.title: Aobire's Spirit Appears
keyEvents.description: Aobire's spirit appears in Tsui Village to give Abi closure about his death.
keyEvents.significance: The emotional climax revealing Aobire's heroic sacrifice and final resting place.

statusHistory.reason: Tsui Village exists as a sacred resting place for Yagara Bulls

culturalSignificance: Tsui Village serves as a sacred resting place where Yagara Bulls go to die, similar to elephant graveyards in folklore. It has spiritual significance and demonstrates the mystical connection between Yagara Bulls.

mythology.description: A mystical location where the spirits of deceased Yagara Bulls can appear to give closure to those they left behind.
beliefs: Yagara Bulls are drawn to Tsui Village when their time comes
Spirits can manifest briefly in this location
All Yagara Bulls throughout Water 7 can sense when one of their kind passes in Tsui Village
